name: Feed the beast (Benmo)
description:
Grow corn to feed the monster so that it doesn’t eat you! Get to 100% to win. If it goes down to 0% then you lose! 

BUG: Input is broken the second time you press Play. Please refresh the web page instead.

Instructions:

  • Click on the monster to feed him!
  • Click on the shop to buy stuff!
  • Plant corn in soil
  • Use shovel to till soil
  • Use shears to harvest corn
  • Place scarecrows to keep the crows away

Hints:

  • Sell corn to buy a shovel once you have a good amount of corn.
